name: HardLanders
description:
Project for the Epic Mega Jam

Team Name: Last Hour crew

4 Players Party Game!

Repair the ship before it crashes into planet earth.

Fill the energy tanks to win, 5 minutes until crash!

The score will be determined by de percentage of broken ship when the game ends.

Controls:

Movement W, A , S, D (Keyboard) / Arrows (Gamepad)

 Pick up, Interact: E  (Keyboard) / A (Gamepad)

Drop Item: Q (keyboard) / B (gamepad)

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission:

Enemy Ships models

Main Menu and in game music 

Ship Textures taken from quixel

Sound Effects: soundly, freesounds.com

Fonts, 1001freefonts.com

Character Animatios: Mixamo
